txt.en: The Captain of the Pit's forces have begun to reclaim Anglach. They must be stopped at all costs.
The Captain of the Pit's forces can be found within Anglach: The Great Foundry.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs, trolls, and goblins within Anglach.

A note hangs from the board, signed by Barathron:
 
'I have spotted a large host of enemy Orcs, goblins, and trolls entering Anglach. I fear they seek to reinforce the foundry to continue making weapons of war for the Captain of the Pit. We must attack before they become entrenched! Seek out Candúr at the Udûn Foothold for passage into Anglach.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Anglach: The Great Foundry to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
